description:
Perl 5.24 is out and it contains interesting new features and changes. I will probably cover a few nuggets you might have missed in older versions.

And for dessert, we will have a glimpse for upcoming or planned changes for 5.26! 

http://act.yapc.eu/ye2016/talk/6776
title: SawyerX: Perl 5 24 and the Zen of Motorcycle Maintenance‎ - YAPC::Europe 2016
